text: Aur woh apney khayal per yeh bhi kehtay hain kay yeh kuch mawashi hain aue khet hain jin ka isteymaal her shaks ko jaeez nahi inn ko koi nahi kha sakta siwaye unn kay jin ko hum chahayen aur mawashi hain jin per sawari ya baar bardari haram ker di gaee aue kuch mawashi hain jin per yeh log Allah Taalaa ka naam nahi letay mehaz Allah per iftra bandhney kay tor per. Abhi Allah Taalaa inn ko inn kay iftra ki saza diye deta hai
